Texts.Eng: And now I'm here. At least until I no longer am. Thankfully that can't happen without a Quintex Obliterator, and those aren't invented yet. Did I miss anything?
Are you that newcomer that Saunter said absolutely adores bees? You must be, or else why would you be here, right?
Few can truly appreciate the fine art of sandwich making. It takes a steady hand, a sharp mind and a keen sense of balance to create true culinary perfection.
For the bread? Rye of course. Not just any rye, though. Not that garbage Jesson used to sell down by the market. I mean real Rye. Stuff like Garla always has. Fresh. Succulent.
From there, you need to set aside the loaf for a bit. You need to let it wait, anticipate your intentions. So for now, lets move on the the Horkulbeast. Get it fresh. It won't be cheap.
Garlic, you ask? Hell yes there is garlid. As much as we can muster. We want about 4 cloves. Trust me here, any less is criminal. Set a pan out, turn on your burner and add some oil while it warms.
I gave up that noble profession, however. My true interest lay down the path of knowledge and understanding. I even invented the ^cyan;Kill-Pod^reset; in ^red;Strawberry^reset;!
I know this not just because you ^green;look^reset; a little bit stupid, but also because I am a master artisan. Yes, really. A ^cyan;Master Sandwich Maker^reset;. The noblest of professions.
Just before you're about to take that horkulbeast, egg and garlic medley off the burder be sure to flap your arms like a bird and screech like a norlaac in mating season.
Kevin knows his stuff. Don't question the genius here: Next I got a nice spoonful of antimatter. I added that to 3 ounces of snarshed soda crackers.
No? Allright. ^red;$#@@#%^reset; it I guess. I'm ^green;Kevin^reset;, and I am probably quite a bit smarter than you are.
No? Allright...you standing there is getting a bit annoying, then. On your bike. Off you go.
Now I needed to toast that bread. Then it was a simple matter of farlixxing the qualtross-barr barrier using the flesh-engine.
Once, I made a sandwich so amazing that my name is forever inscribed in the ^orange;Hall of Sandwiches^reset; on Cygnus Igni IV. Look it up. There's even a ^red;#$@%%$^reset; statue and stuff.
The difference in the meat quality though...that's unmistakeable. You won't ever want to eat another thing again, I promise you that. Once I add the rest of the ingredients...mmmmm.
Then I combined all that crap. The perfect, sapient, singing sandwich. It looked amazing, by the way. Truly astonishing. The screams when devoured...less so.
We're going to fry the horkulbeast now, at about medium for 3 minutes a side. While it cooks, mash up the garlic and add it in. Then we just need one more thing.
What is it you ask? Why obviously thats love and tenderness! You wanna cook that stuff up for 3 mins per side, flipping only once.
^red;What do you need now, Jesson?!?!?^reset; Oh. It's not him. Hi. What?
